summary: Forsaken Cellar, A vampire player home.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=4][b]Forsaken Cellar, a Vampire/Dark Brotherhood player home.
[/b][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][b][size=2]
A small vampire home I made for my character, the way I like it. I have not nav meshed the cellar, its tiny anyway. So you should ask your followers to wait outside. Decent camping spot just a few feet from the entrance (Frostfall/Campfire). This mod was made and testing with [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450][size=2]RLO[/size][/url][size=2], it must be installed to get the lighting like my screenshots. Or you could try another lighting mod (not supported by me). I also highly recommend [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214][size=2]USLEEP[/size][/url], [/b][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655]SMIM[/url][/size], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607][size=2]Skyrim HD[/size][/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62701][size=2]Rustic Potions[/size][/url], [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62328]Rustic Alchemy and Enchanting Tables[/url][/size][/size][/font][size=3][b][size=2]. Enjoy :)

[font=Georgia]
Features:[/font][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=2]Enchanting Station
Alchemy Station
Throne
Coffin
Lots of named storage[/size]
[size=2]Bookcase[/size]
[/b][size=2][b]Corpse Storage
Blood splatters
[/b]
[b]Special features[/b]
[b]Vampire Blood Potion[/b] [b](turns player into a vampire instantly)
Summon Gargoyle spell (on top of enchanting station)
[/b]
[/size]
[/size]
author: Arenthia
